sentence.Network_en: Nancy waited breathlessly for him to go on.
sentence.Network_cn: 南希屏息静气等着他说下去。
“我会进去。”他上气不接下气地说。
他上气不接下气地猛冲进来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... breathless 无声息的 breathlessly 气喘地 breathtaking 惊人的.
哈利波特与魔法石第十一章... ... gotten 的过去分词四级词汇 breathlessly 气喘吁吁地四级词汇 dangerously 危险六级词汇.
ＬＯＬ之全英雄台词撸友必备收藏！... ... Let the winds take me 风呀，带我一程吧！ Breathlessly 屏住呼吸！ Smart choice 明智之选.
pitch：本意投掷，此指目标。breathlessly：气喘吁吁地，上气不接下气地。In a three-way race, Bella squeaked to victory by.

list.abs: Millions of people breathlessly watching black - and - white images of Neil Armstrong bounding across a rocky landscape ., 数百万观众屏息拭目观看尼尔阿姆斯特朗跃过岩丘景观的黑白画面.
answer bravely勇敢地回答answer breathlessly喘不过气地回答answer briefly简略地回答
The boys listened breathlessly as the sailor detailed the story of the shipwreck ., 水手详述沉船的故事时 , 孩子们屏息倾听着.
She spoke breathlessly ., 她气喘吁吁地说.

entry.tran: 上气不接下气的；呼吸困难的；气喘吁吁的
entry.def: If you are breathless, you have difficulty in breathing properly, for example because you have been running  or because you are afraid or excited.

example.ex: I was a little breathless and my heartbeat was bumpy and fast...
example.tran: 我有点儿喘不上气，心脏咚咚地快速跳动着。
我们满怀期待，激动得快要无法呼吸。

entry.def: You use breathless for emphasis when you are describing feelings of excitement or exciting situations.

example.ex: Technology has advanced at a breathless pace.
example.tran: 技术进步速度惊人，日新月异。

example.ex: ...the breathless excitement of early 1988, when hundreds and thousands of citizens gathered nightly for political meetings.
example.tran: 1988年年初，兴奋与狂热的情绪令人窒息，成百上千的市民每晚聚在一起参加政治集会
